name: AA Touch Gun!
description: Classic timekiller. Defend yourself from the attack of the aircraft. Destroy all the planes. You can get bonuses for the destruction of enemies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer: 32bit / 64bit Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 512 MB Video RAM Storage: 350 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
